name: handlebars-jle
description: Faster Handlebars templating with JSON Logic Engine

scripts.build: rm -f *.d.ts parser/*.d.ts && peggy --format es --cache -o parser/parser.js parser/grammar.peggy && bun build --minify parser/parser.js --outfile parser/parser.min.js && rm parser/parser.js && tsc index.js --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --target ESNext --moduleResolution classic && bun build --minify index.js --outdir=dist/cjs --format cjs --external 'json-logic-engine' --sourcemap=external && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json && bun build --minify index.js --outdir=dist/esm --format esm --external 'json-logic-engine' --sourcemap=external && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json
